comment._content: This is Major Purcell O'Gorman chairman and a founder of Waterford Boat Club

comment.author: 33577523@N08
comment._content: Waterford Boat club also has their own photostream on Flickr www.flickr.com/photos/waterfordboatclub/

comment.author: 38524172@N08
comment._content: Gentleman on left seated is Austin Farrell, 1872-1934. He appears in other photographs  NLI Ref.: P_WP_3697, NLI Ref.: P_WP_3697.....

comment.author: 38524172@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/33577523@N08]  It would be great to see some of the early pictures from Waterford Boat Club on this photostream.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/38524172@N08] Hello again, Brendan! I've added links into the description above, so you can find all your great uncle's photos in one place.

I'll add another photo with Austin Farrell on Monday. Hopefully you'll be able to help identify some of the others...
